title: Why 9 to 5 isn't the only shift that can work for busy families

title_detail.value: Why 9 to 5 isn't the only shift that can work for busy families

summary: A new study finds that the impacts of parent work schedules on children vary by age and gender, and often reflect which shift a parent works. Rotating shifts -- a schedule that varies day by day or week by week -- can be most problematic for children.
